summary: This my own ENB for people like more lighting in their game.
descriptionHtml:
INSTALLATION
- ENB Series the latest which is 0.308, please download the binary files at
  http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0221.htm and extract d3d9.dll
  to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located), and overwrite
  if asked.



- Extract the contents from the "main files" folder to your Skyrim
  folder (where TESV.exe is located), and overwrite if asked.
  The contents of the "Data" folder is required as well.
  NOTE: Please use the files from the "performance options" folders
  instead of choosing to enable/disable a feature manually. Each
  one has been specially tweaked to give the best result. Copy the
  file of your choice to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe is located),
  and overwrite if asked.



- Open your SkyrimPrefs.ini file located in your "My Documents"
  folder and make sure these lines are set:
  bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
  bDrawLandShadows=1
  bTreesReceiveShadows=1




- Open enblocal.ini and set the VideoMemorySizeMb parameter.
  (e.g. VRAM + RAM - 2048)



- Disable AA in the SkyrimLauncher options



- (Optional) The "optional effects" folder contains additional
  effects that provide more customization. Copy the contents of the
  option folder of your choice to your Skyrim folder (where TESV.exe
  is located), and overwrite if asked.



- (Optional) Download and install the mods listed in the
  "Recommended Mods" section.



- Load your game and turn the in-game Brightness all the way down.




- Enjoy! :)
--------------------------------------------------------------






[list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57353]Optimized Vanilla Textures[/url] by tony971 (optional but recommended, start "Texture Installer.exe" in Data folder after installation.)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14227/?]Ruins Clutter Improved[/url] by raiserfx[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/?]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD[/url] by Ichibu >>FPS<< (my preference is Cinematic Fire FX Legacy)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29782]HD Enhanced Terrain[/url] by Hritik Vaishnav -SkyrimENB (Type 2, Old but best)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19446]The Skyrim Distance Overhaul LOD Improvement[/url] by Grieche[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564]SkyFalls and SkyMills - Animated Distant Waterfalls and WindMills[/url] by SjoertJansen (Do not install optional New Skyrim LOD and install the patch for SDO)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655]Static Mesh Improvement Mod - SMIM[/url] by Brumbek[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607]Skyrim HD - 2K Textures - Skyrim HD FULL - Landscape, Dungeons, Towns, Misc, Rifton[/url] by NebuLa >>FPS<< (use LITE version for better FPS)[/size]
[*][size=3]OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/45807/?]NobleSkyrimMod HD-2K[/url] by Shutt3r (Also install SMIM patch from it's optionals!)[/size]
[*][size=3]OR [url=https://www.google.at/webhp?sourceid=chrome-instant&rlz=1C1GTPM_deAT495AT495&ion=1&espv=2&ie=UTF-8#q=skyrim%20realistic%20overhaul%20starac]Skyrim Realistic Overhaul[/url] by Starac (not available on Nexus, but my favorite. You will have to google for it)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39874]Vivid Landscapes - Dungeons and Ruins[/url] by Aron (also install SMIM Compatibility patch and if using ELFX also ELFX Compatibility patch!)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41198]Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area[/url] by Aron[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39190]aMidianBorn Caves and Mines[/url] by CaBaL[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40245]Immersive Roads[/url] by 32cm OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518]Real Roads for Skyrim[/url] by dukefx >>FPS<<[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] by vurt >>FPS<< (my favorite: SFO v1.71 + AOF Trees LODs from SFO optionals)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3812]TreesHD_Skyrim_Variation[/url] by namotep[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56877]Skysight - Simply Bigger Trees[/url] by fadingsignal >>FPS<<[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61875]4K Parallax Treebark[/url] by FKPX3118 (don't forget to install the SBT patch!)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55699]Immersive Fallen Trees Mod[/url] by Jurassic4LIFE[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58980]Fences of Skyrim - No more flickering fences[/url] by Therobwil (my favorite)[/size]
[*][size=3]OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13268]3D-2D Fences from The Ruffled Feather - Mod Collection[/url] by SparrowPrince[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220]Verdant - A Skyrim Grass Plugin[/url] by Preeum >>FPS<<[/size]
[size=3](use Dark grass textures - 1K VERSION and set iMaxGrassTypesPerTexure=15 and iMinGrassSize=70 in Skyrim.ini)[/size][*][size=3]OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33582]Grass on Steroids[/url] by Skyrimaguas (i'm using iMinGrassSize=40 in Skyrim.ini, set it to 75 for better performance)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30164]Natural Grass Texture Floor[/url] by emd[/size]
[*][size=3]Install RealVision Flora Patch from my optional files to adjust some oversaturated and too bright plants and grasses to work with RealVision ENB[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30971]High Definition Ivy - 2K[/url] by Josh Ezzell and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1878]Replacement Ivy[/url] by Thonk[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64830]RUGNAROK[/url] by Gamwich OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608]Detailed Rugs[/url] by raiserfx[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076]Realistic Water Two[/url] by isoku >>FPS<< (my preference, also install Realistic Water Two - ENB Textures from his optionals!)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/url] by paganmetalf (strongly recommended to get intended water brightness!)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59547]Transparent wave spray Retexture for realistic water 2[/url] by Pfuscher aka Zerwas1[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1111/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D1111&pUp=1]optional landscape textures from Pure Waters[/url] by Laast (specific landscape textures (HD) for water areas)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4805]AOF Detailed Mountains[/url] by AnOldFriend (my preference) OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38004]Vivid Landscapes - Rocking Stones and Mountains Parallax[/url] by Aron[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38497]Vivid Landscapes - Cliffs and Creeks[/url] by Aron (also install Rocking Stones and Mountains Parallax - Compatibility Patch if you use his rocks!)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43221]Vivid Landscapes - Tundra Moss Revised[/url] by Aron (also use its SMIM compatibility patch)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44201]Dust Effects[/url] by HHaleyy OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2636]Finer Dust[/url] by CptJoker[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/836]Realistic Smoke and Embers[/url] by isoku (my preference) OR [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23352]Better embers[/url] by Dragonborn77[/size]
[*][size=3]Now install Skyrim_Particle_Patch_for_ENB-All-In-One and Skyrim_Subsurface_Scattering_Patch_for_ENB by mindflux from [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?t=1499]here[/url] or my optional files but do NOT overwrite SMIM, say "No to mod" if NMM asks to overwrite SMIM![/size]
[size=3]Recommended mods for Parallax Terrain texture users: (set FixParallaxTerrain=true in enblocal.ini or use them without Parallax like me)[/size][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61929]Skyrim 2015 Parallax Terrain SPT[/url] by Pfuscher aka Zerwas1 (I'm using Pineforrest, Riverbededge, Rivermud, Snow01, Snow02)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61416]tamu75 Terrain Parallax Textures[/url] by tamu7 (I'm using Coast Beach, PineForest02)[/size]
[/list][size=3]


Install in this order:

[/size][list]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802]Project Reality - Climates Of Tamriel[/url] by JJC71 (use all default settings and the Dawnguard and Dragonborn patches if using those DLCs)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27022]Supreme Storms for Climates of Tamriel[/url] by MannyGT (optional, but recommended)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799]Climates of Tamriel - Weather Patch[/url] by prod80 [/size]
[size=3]ONLY activate Supreme Storms like second pic if you are using Supreme Storms!!! For the night level, decide by yourself, i'm recommending level 2 or 3.[/size][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478]True Storms - Thunder and Rain Redone[/url] by fadingsignal (select CoT weather patch and if using also Supreme Storms patch during installation like [url=http://www.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/truestorms14cpi7aetbd.jpg]here[/url])[/size]
[size=3](set Enable=false in [RAIN] section of enbseries.ini for True Storms own raintextures if you prefer it over ENB rain)[/size][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15506]Lightning during Thunder Storms[/url] by Minty (optional)[/size]
[*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25675]Lightning during Thunder Storms - Climates of Tamriel - Patch[/url] by Minty (ONLY if using the main mod of course)[/size]
[*]
[/list][size=3]



[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url] by The Realistic Lighting Team
[i]My preference for realism![/i][/size][list]
[*][size=3]Activate all modules except Adaptive Interiors Vanilla Weathers and Realistic Lighting Weathers! As shown [url=http://img4.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/rlo10tk4uwm1eo.jpg]here[/url] and [url=http://img5.fotos-hochladen.net/uploads/rlo4081ol0ancugzk.jpg]here[/url].[/size]
[*][size=3]Only activate Dawnguard interiors if you are using Dawnguard![/size]
[/list]
author: Sharan Rao
